title: CPU Usage A LOT Higher since patch 7.3
body:
**Stuff That Happens**
1. Go to any champion select in any kind of draft mode.
2. Several **LeagueClientUxHelper.exe's** start running.
3. One of them goes up to 50% CPU usage (normally mine is 10-20%).
4. Everything gets loud and a lot hotter than usual.

This has never happened previously, so it's something to do with this patch.

-------
**Stuff**
1.  i7-4790k
2. MSI Z97
3. 16 GB RAM
4. GTX 970
5. Win7 64-bit

----
**More Stuff**
1. Nothing else is running.
2. All updates that I can possibly have are installed for my OS.
3. My hardware is not faulty.
4. Running in a lower-end mode does not help.

----
**_Why dis happen?_**

The guide will help make sure that your drivers, game files, and hardware are configured to run smoothly.  After you've gone through each step, load up a custom game and let me know if things are any different.

Overheating can certainly cause some issues, especially with fps.  If it's not maintained it could also cause your PC to shut down too.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) o our tech team can continue working on this with you.
